panel_controller - Variable in class extensions.Hierarchy
Controls for the panel
Panel_Controller - Class in extensions
The panel controller has the buttons that can be used by the user to move panels and do other things At the moments the movement is actually taken care by the view This is because the panel has no idea where it is within the frame The frame can be vertical or horizontal, depending on the action performed or user choice
Panel_Controller() - Constructor for class extensions.Panel_Controller
Default constructor Sets the name to empty and adds the contents
